BGSHOP_DESCRIPTION: This commands will open the Background shop, displaying all available Backgrounds you can purchase for your 3D cards. Clicking on any of the names on the embed will open a webpage showcasing the specific Background
BGS_SLASH_DESC: Enter the code of the "Background" that you are looking for
APPLY_BG: Use the command `{{prefix}}buy bg <Background-ID> <Amount>` to buy a **Background**
NO_BG_FOUND: {{author}} Could not find any **Background** with that ID
